name: Cubefinity (AndrewIDFK)
description:
Cubefinity

Welcome to Cubefinity, an engaging idle game all about creating and collecting cubes.

Build a unique array of cube generators, gather an ever-growing assortment of cubes, and strategically Fluxuate to earn valuable Flux funds. Unlock a variety of upgrades to enhance your cube-collecting adventure!

Enjoy offline gains and progress even when the game is closed, ensuring your cube collection never stops growing! [Offline progress may be bugged]

Controls

Escape (esc) - [Exit Game]

Left Click - [Everything Else]

Cubefinity auto-saves your progress every 60 seconds and each time you close the game, ensuring your cube dominion remains intact. 

Save data is located in your application data roaming folder.

Feedback

As my first game, your feedback and suggestions are highly valued! Enjoy conquering the cubic realm!

There are plans to add all sorts of new content to the game over time, this is just an early version that I wanted to share!
